interfaceText.failed1: Sorry, you have not passed the test.

interfaceText.notPrinted:
Your certificate has not been printed
Are you sure you want to log out?

abrasive1.question: Before using an abrasive wheel what should you check?
answers: The safety guard is in place
You have a Permit to Work

abrasive2.question: What should you always wait for before using an abrasive wheel?
answers: The wheel has reached full speed

confinedSpaces1.question: What must you not do when working in a confined space?

answers: You have been trained and authorised to do so and have\na Permit to Work
